title: Disconnecting while in the game loading screen
body:
Unable to connect to the game after champion select it give me some sort of error saying "could not connect check your internet connection" or something like that. Anyways the point is I have been leaver busted by the "remake" system, it took me about 4 minutes to try and reconnect after restarting my computer.  I don't know what to do about the leavers, but at least help me with my client, here are the steps I have taken

* Repairing client
* Re downloading and installing client
* manually transferring a friends client who claims to never crash (which it happened to him today as well)
* playing in custom games to test client load screen and it didn't crash (but it did in an actual game)

Any help is appreciated, I do not know what to do as far as fixing client.  can we at least talk about my leavers? 
P.S. I am on a updated x64 bit computer
Thank you!

replies.body:
Connections errors after champ select are usually a sign that your client cannot establish a great connection to the game server. Most often, this is caused by local network settings that conflict with League, so I recommend working through the steps outlined in our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps helped with this issue.
